widget.title: ComboBox
widget.p: ComboBox is a combination of a text field and drop-down list. This example has a default value, two choices, and it is editable.

parameters.parameter: The icon image that the combobox displays.
Invokes the given method when there was change in the text or a new choice was selected.
The index of the currently selected choice, value -1 indicates a custom edited value in an editable box.
text, columns, and editable parameters are described at textfield
name, enabled, visible, tooltip, property, i18n, width, height, colspan, rowspan, weightx, weighty, halign, and valign parameters are similar to component

widget.title: Choice
widget.p: The drop down list of a combobox contains choices. The combolist popup internally handles scrolling.

parameters.parameter: Enables or disables the item. A disabled item is painted gray, and can't be selected by mouse or keyboard.
The text text that the choice displays.
The icon image that the choice displays.
The alignment of the text and image similar to label. Possible values are: left, center, and right.
The text pops up when the mouse lingers inside this specified part of the component, otherwise the tooltip text of the component.
Custom font to use for text.
Adds an arbitrary key/value client property stored in a hashtable of the item. The format of its value is key=value (or key=value;key=value ... for multiple keys), both are string objects.
